title: Chinese beef and pineapple stir fry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g beef steak, diced', '1 tablespoon oil', '1/2 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 red pepper, chopped', 'Sauce', '4 tablespoons HP original sauce', '2 tablespoons tinned pineapple syrup', 'sugar to taste', '1 (425g) tin pineapple slices, drained and chopped']
